meanings.definition: The action of using up a resource.
meanings.sent1: Her consumptions of water during the hike were impressive.
meanings.sent2: Excessive consumptions of electricity can lead to high bills.
meanings.sent3: His consumptions of snacks during the movie were so frequent, he ran out before it ended.
meanings.sent4: The consumptions of fuel by the car were so rapid, it needed refueling often.
meanings.sent5: The consumptions of time in the meeting seemed endless.

meanings.definition: The act of eating or drinking something.
meanings.sent1: Healthy consumptions of fruits and vegetables are important for a balanced diet.
meanings.sent2: His consumptions of pizza and soda were not helping his health.
meanings.sent3: Her consumptions of ice cream after dinner always brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The consumptions of knowledge through reading are beneficial for personal growth.
meanings.sent5: The consumptions of soup on a cold day warmed her up instantly.

meanings.definition: A wasting disease, especially pulmonary tuberculosis.
meanings.sent1: In the 19th century, consumptions was a common and deadly illness.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with consumptions after a series of tests.
meanings.sent3: The character in the novel suffered from consumptions, adding a tragic element to the story.
meanings.sent4: Consumptions was a feared disease before medical advancements improved treatment.
meanings.sent5: The historical records showed a high mortality rate due to consumptions.
